top_stories.title: Dynamic Expert Quantization for Scalable Mixture-of-Experts Inference
top_stories.summary: arXiv:2511.15015v3 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: Mixture-of-Experts (MoE) has become a practical architecture for scaling LLM capacity while keeping per-token compute modest, but deploying MoE models on a single, memory-limited GPU remains difficult because expert weights dominate the HBM footprint. Existing expert offloading and prefetchi
top_stories.technical_takeaway: Hardware and energy constraints now shape model design decisions.
top_stories.primary_risk: Compute scaling limited by physical and energy infrastructure.

top_stories.title: No Company Has Admitted to Replacing Workers With AI in New York
top_stories.summary: New York state has required companies to disclose if “technological innovation or automation” was the cause of job loss for nearly a year. So far, none has.
top_stories.technical_takeaway: Signals incremental evolution rather than a paradigm shift in current AI systems.
top_stories.primary_risk: Marginal performance gains may not justify integration effort.
top_stories.primary_opportunity: Practical improvements when layered onto existing AI workflows.

top_stories.title: AI Is Here to Replace Nuclear Treaties. Scared Yet?
top_stories.summary: The last major nuclear arms treaty between the US and Russia just expired. Some experts believe a combination of satellite surveillance, AI, and human reviewers can take its place. Others, not so much.
top_stories.technical_takeaway: Trust, not model size, is becoming a core technical constraint in AI systems.
top_stories.primary_risk: Regulatory exposure and erosion of public trust due to opaque data practices.
top_stories.primary_opportunity: Differentiation through auditable, privacy-preserving AI pipelines.

top_stories.title: Why the Moltbook frenzy was like Pokémon
top_stories.summary: This story originally appeared in The Algorithm, our weekly newsletter on AI. To get stories like this in your inbox first, sign up here. Lots of influential people in tech last week were describing Moltbook, an online hangout populated by AI agents interacting with one another, as a glimpse into the future. It appeared to show…
top_stories.technical_takeaway: Agent orchestration is emerging as a new software abstraction layer.
top_stories.primary_risk: Debugging complexity and cascading failures in agentic systems.
top_stories.primary_opportunity: End-to-end automation of complex cognitive workflows.

top_stories.title: Making AI Work, MIT Technology Review’s new AI newsletter, is here
top_stories.summary: For years, our newsroom has explored AI’s limitations and potential dangers, as well as its growing energy needs. top_stories.primary_risk: Compute scaling limited by physical and energy infrastructure.
